original: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁saraṇ aṃ ▁dassanena ▁pahātabb aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁n asaraṇ o ▁na dassan ena ▁pahātabb o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ

original: Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁araṇ aṃ ▁nevadassanena ▁nabhāvanāya ▁pahātabb aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paccayā ▁na a ra ṇ o ▁nan eva dassan ena ▁nabhāvanāya ▁pahātabb o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ
